# Ratix
![E46e2TX|500x500](upload://utYzY3kdl5zEO4yOeNom097dYGx.gif)
>NFT art collection of 10,000 unique Rats coming to live exclusively on the Radix network. All original artwork has been created from scratch and with love. **Price of each NFT:** 50 XRD (early bird) **Links:** * [Website](https://www.ratixnft.com/) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ratixnft) * [Telegram](https://t.me/ratixnft)
